info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 19 at 12:57PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A SNOW SQUALL WILL AFFECT PARTS OF WESTERN RENSSELAER...EASTERN RENSSELAER...SOUTHERN WASHINGTON...AND NORTHERN SARATOGA COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A snow squall which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 1256 PM EST, a snow squall was along a line extending from near Greenwich to near Mechanicville and moving east at 40 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED... This squall will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Western Rensselaer, north central Eastern Rensselaer, southwestern Southern Washington and southeastern Northern Saratoga Counties. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this squall. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
